message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, but let me know if you have any thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $13,500 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider my revised offer?
